meanings.sent1: The unquiets classroom made it hard to focus on my work.
meanings.sent2: The unquiets children were playing loudly in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The unquiets birds chirping outside my window woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: The unquiets wind howled through the night, keeping me awake.
meanings.sent5: The unquiets thunderstorm rattled the windows with its loud booms.

meanings.sent1: The scary movie unquiets my little sister, so she sleeps with a nightlight.
meanings.sent2: The uncertainty of the future unquiets many people.
meanings.sent3: The thought of spiders unquiets my friend, making her jump at every shadow.
meanings.sent4: The news of the upcoming test unquiets the students in the class.
meanings.sent5: The barking dog unquiets the peaceful neighborhood every night.

meanings.sent1: The unquiets of the city can be overwhelming for some people.
meanings.sent2: The unquiets in the house were a result of the ongoing argument.
meanings.sent3: The unquiets of the crowded mall made it hard to hear my friend talking.
meanings.sent4: The unquiets of the storm outside made it difficult to relax and read a book.
meanings.sent5: The unquiets of the busy street kept me from falling asleep easily.
